name: self-replicating-art
description: Automated service that **pulls every product & grid image from Apes On Keys (Shopify + S3)**, distills them with GPT‑4o Vision, generates a fresh on‑brand graphic via OpenAI's Image Generation API, stores the file in S3, updates a JSON manifest, and pings a Vercel Deploy Hook so the storefront grid self‑replicates daily.
